jobActivity.title: LinkedIn Message for a position
jobActivity.body:
Hello Wael,
I have come up a Dynamics CRM position in LinkedIn and would like to offer my experiences for HSBC as a contractor.
If you are looking for an outstanding Dynamics 365 CRM expert. let me know, I am ready to make Dynamics 365 a giant player in your daily business .
Regards,
Muhammet Atalay, B&B Information Technologies Services ltd. Owner and Senior CRM Consultant
Note: I have not applied to the position since it is permanent - https://www.indeed.co.uk/Dynamic-Crm-Business-Analyst-jobs?vjk=2222257193f76805
